pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Brilliance 85 Violet Vision New
pageProduct.description:
Information

Brilliance provides irresistible colour intensity for up to 10 weeks, with up to 100% grey coverage. The Diamond Gloss Sealer post-colour treatment contains keratin and apricot kernel oil for healthy-looking and stronger hair, NOW in a tube for easy application and multiple uses.

Do your own hair colour at home with Schwarzkopf Brilliance!

Get bold and take your hair colouration to the next level with our selection of fashion-forwarded shades.

1. Developer:

long lasting colour intensity, the high- performance colour formula provides you with irresistible colour intensity for Up to 10 weeks and up to 100% grey coverage.

2. Colour cream

Available in 17 fashion-forward shades.

3.Diamond Gloss Sealer in a tube

Post-colour treatment contains keratin and apricot kernel oil for healthy-looking, stronger hair. It lokcs in the colour pigments and helps your colour stay more vibrant for longer. Now in a tube for easy application and multiple uses.

4. Pair of gloves

General Information

Schwarzkopf Brilliance offers permanent fashion shades with brilliant shine and up to 10 weeks intensity.

The high-performance hair colour formula provides you with perfect grey coverage and irressistible colour intensity for up to 10 weeks. The Diamond Gloss Sealer post-colour treatment contains Keratin and Apricot Kernel Oil for healthy-looking, stronger hair. it locks in the colour the colour pigments and helps your colour stay more vibrant for longer. Now in a tube for easy application and multiple uses.

Suitable For: We recommend this shade of Brilliance for Medium Brown to Black hair. This shade is suitable for up to 50 % grey hair.

Product Claims: Up to 10 weeks Colour Intensity

Boxed Contents: 1x Tube Colour Cream 60ml
1x Bottle Developer 60ml (1:1)
1x Tube Diamond Gloss Sealer 50ml
1x Pair of Gloves
1x Instruction leaflet

Size: 1 pack

KEY FEATURES

• Up to 10 weeks Colour Intensity
• Brilliant Shine
• Perfect grey coverage
• Diamon Gloss Sealer with Keratin & Apricot Kernel Oil- Now in a tube
• Permanent

Warnings

WARNING - This product contains ingredients which may cause skin sensitisation to certain individuals. A preliminary test according to accompanying directions should be made before use. This product must not be used for dyeing eyelashes or eyebrows; to do so may be injurious to the eye. DO NOT SWALLOW. Repeated exposure may cause sensitisation. Rinse hair well after application. Wear suitable gloves.

Conduct an allergy alert test 48 hours before each time you colour (see enclosed leaflet), even if you have already used colouring products before. So remember to buy the product 48 hours in advance. In case of any reaction or when in doubt consult a doctor before using any hair colour product. Avoid contact with eyes. Rinse eyes immediately if product comes into contact with them. Wear suitable gloves.
Keep out of reach of children.

FIRST AID INFORMATION

FIRST AID: For advice, contact a Poisons Information Centre (Phone eg Australia 13 1126; New Zealand 0800 764 766) or a doctor (at once). Rinse hair well after application. See bottom of pack for full list of ingredients.

Ingredients

Colour Cream: Aqua (Water, Eau) ? Cetearyl Alcohol ? Ammonium Hydroxide ? Coconut Alcohol ?
Sodium Laureth Sulfate ? Isostearic Acid ? Potassium Hydroxide ? Bis-Diisopropanolamino-
PG-Propyl Dimethicone/Bis-Isobutyl PEG-14 Copolymer ? Sodium Lauryl Glucose
Carboxylate ? Dimethicone ? 1-Hydroxyethyl 4,5-Diamino Pyrazole Sulfate ? Lauryl Glucoside ?
Toluene-2,5-Diamine Sulfate ? Myristic Acid ? Ceteareth-20 ? 1-Naphthol ? m-Aminophenol ?
Sodium Sulfite ? Parfum (Fragrance) ? Ceteareth-12 ? 2-Amino-4-Hydroxyethylaminoanisole
Sulfate ? Sodium Chloride ? Ammonium Sulfate ? Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil ? Sodium
Silicate ? Citric Acid ? Etidronic Acid ? Butyloctanol ? Polysorbate 20 ? Linalool ? Ascorbic Acid ?
Citronellol ? Sorbic Acid
Developer: Aqua (Water, Eau) ? Hydrogen Peroxide ? Cetearyl Alcohol ? PEG-40 Castor Oil ? Disodium
Pyrophosphate ? Sodium Cetearyl Sulfate ? Disodium EDTA ? Sodium Benzoate ? Phosphoric Acid
Diamond Gloss Sealer: Aqua (Water, Eau) ? Cetearyl Alcohol ? Isopropyl Myristate ? Behentrimonium
Chloride ? Distearoylethyl Hydroxyethylmonium Methosulfate ? Magnesium Citrate ?
Benzophenone-4 ? Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil ? Panthenol ? Cocodimonium
Hydroxypropyl Hydrolyzed Keratin ? Hydrolyzed Keratin ? Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine ?
Cetyl Palmitate ? Phenoxyethanol ? Isopropyl Alcohol ? Methylparaben ? Parfum
(Fragrance) ? Citric Acid ? Dimethicone ? Polyquaternium-37 ? Cetrimonium Chloride ?
Dicaprylyl Carbonate ? Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride ? Linalool ? Sodium
Hydroxide ? Hexyl Cinnamal ? Limonene ? Benzyl Salicylate ? Lauryl Glucoside

Contains: CONTAINS NO MORE THAN 40 G/L AMMONIUM HYDROXIDE

Directions

Please read and follow instruction leaflet carefully. Product can cause an allergic reaction. Wear suitable gloves. DO NOT SWALLOW. Rinse hair well after application.

USAGE ADVICE

On long or thick hair and for first time use we recommend using two packs of Brilliance.

SAFETY DIRECTIONS

SAFETY INSTRUCTIONS
Hair colourants can cause severe allergic
reactions.
Read and follow instructions. This product is not
intended for use on persons under the age of 16.
Temporary "black henna" tattoos may increase your
risk of allergy.
Do not colour your hair if:
- you have a rash on your face or sensitive, irritated
and damaged scalp,
- you have ever experienced any reaction after
colouring your hair,
- you have experienced a reaction to a temporary
"black henna" tattoo in the past.
Contains hydrogen peroxide, phenylenediamines
(toluenediamines), resorcinol and ammonia.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Box, leaflet and bottle (after cleaning) can be placed in kerbside recycling bins. Gloves, glove packet, tubes and tube caps
cannot be placed in kerbside recycling bins, but can be recycled via TerraCycle.
Visit TerraCycle.com for details.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
